Our beautiful Charleston, SC hotel is conveniently located off Savannah Highway and overlooks the Ashley River. Our location is perfect for guests looking for accommodations near Charleston’s best attractions. Charleston is known for its amazing history, restaurants, and shops. We offer a shuttle service to the historic Downtown Charleston area for your comfort and convenience. Looking to enjoy a day in the sun? Folly Beach, Sullivan’s Island and Isle of Palms are all within a short drive of our amazing downtown Charleston hotel. Be sure to visit nearby attractions such as the South Carolina Aquarium, Fort Sumter, Magnolia Plantation and Gardens, Charleston City Market, or the USS Yorktown. We are conveniently located only ten miles from the Charleston International Airport. The Holiday Inn Charleston Riverview hotel provides guests with great amenities such as an outdoor pool, 1200-sq ft meeting room, Executive Board Room, a newly renovated Fitness Center, and 24-hour Business Center. Don’t forget to grab dinner and drinks at our on-site Harborview Restaurant and Lounge, located on the top floor of this 14 story Charleston hotel. You are sure to enjoy our spectacular panoramic views of the Charleston city scape and harbor. Simply sit back, relax, and let our shuttle take you on a journey of discovery. The shuttle runs once every hour daily from 7:30 am to 10:30 pm so that you can explore the city at your own pace without any worries.
